description.value:
The Undead lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell LevelSpells
cantrip@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMessage000]{Message}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBane000000]{Bane}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFalseLife0]{False Life}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.mycojDbHOZg2luJc]{Blindness/Deafness}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.F2efriniToiMPjfv]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPhantomSte]{Phantom Steed}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpeakWithD]{Speak with Dead}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDeathWard0]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAntilifeSh]{Antilife Shell}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCloudkill0]{Cloudkill}
